enumeratedValue.description: use Von Neumann data into both Entropy shifter and Statistical Checker
use raw data into both Entropy shifter and Statistical Checker
use Von Neumann data into Entropy shifter. Use raw data into Statistical Checker
use ring oscillator with no divide

field.name: UNUSED
field.description: This bit is unused but write-able. Must be left as zero

field.name: FCT_VAL
field.description: Read only: Frequency Count Valid. Indicates that a valid frequency count may be read from FRQCNT

field.name: TST_OUT
field.description: Read only: Test point inside ring oscillator

register.name: SCR1C
register.description: Statistical Check Run Length 1 Count Register

register.name: SCR1L
register.description: Statistical Check Run Length 1 Limit Register

register.name: SCR2C
register.description: Statistical Check Run Length 2 Count Register

register.name: SCR2L
register.description: Statistical Check Run Length 2 Limit Register

register.description: Statistical Check Run Length 3 Count Register

register.name: SCR3L
register.description: Statistical Check Run Length 3 Limit Register

register.name: SCR4C
register.description: Statistical Check Run Length 4 Count Register

register.name: SCR4L
register.description: Statistical Check Run Length 4 Limit Register

register.name: SCR5C
register.description: Statistical Check Run Length 5 Count Register

register.name: SCR5L
register.description: Statistical Check Run Length 5 Limit Register

register.name: SCR6PC
register.description: Statistical Check Run Length 6+ Count Register

register.name: SCR6PL
register.description: Statistical Check Run Length 6+ Limit Register

field.name: TF1BR0
field.description: Test Fail, 1-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF1BR0=1, the 1-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed

field.name: TF1BR1
field.description: Test Fail, 1-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF1BR1=1, the 1-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed

field.name: TF2BR0
field.description: Test Fail, 2-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF2BR0=1, the 2-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed

field.name: TF2BR1
field.description: Test Fail, 2-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF2BR1=1, the 2-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed

field.name: TF3BR0
field.description: Test Fail, 3-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF3BR0=1, the 3-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed

field.name: TF3BR1
field.description: Test Fail, 3-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF3BR1=1, the 3-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed

field.name: TF4BR0
field.description: Test Fail, 4-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF4BR0=1, the 4-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed

field.name: TF4BR1
field.description: Test Fail, 4-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF4BR1=1, the 4-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed

field.name: TF5BR0
field.description: Test Fail, 5-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF5BR0=1, the 5-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed

field.name: TF5BR1
field.description: Test Fail, 5-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF5BR1=1, the 5-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed

field.name: TF6PBR0
field.description: Test Fail, 6 Plus Bit Run, Sampling 0s

field.name: TF6PBR1
field.description: Test Fail, 6 Plus Bit Run, Sampling 1s

field.name: TFSB
field.description: Test Fail, Sparse Bit. If TFSB=1, the Sparse Bit Test has failed

field.name: TFLR
field.description: Test Fail, Long Run. If TFLR=1, the Long Run Test has failed

field.name: TFP
field.description: Test Fail, Poker. If TFP=1, the Poker Test has failed

field.name: TFMB
field.description: Test Fail, Mono Bit. If TFMB=1, the Mono Bit Test has failed

register.name: PKRCNT10
register.description: Statistical Check Poker Count 1 and 0 Register

register.name: PKRCNT32
register.description: Statistical Check Poker Count 3 and 2 Register

register.name: PKRCNT54
register.description: Statistical Check Poker Count 5 and 4 Register

register.name: PKRCNT76
register.description: Statistical Check Poker Count 7 and 6 Register

register.name: PKRCNT98
register.description: Statistical Check Poker Count 9 and 8 Register

register.name: PKRCNTBA
register.description: Statistical Check Poker Count B and A Register

register.name: PKRCNTDC
register.description: Statistical Check Poker Count D and C Register

register.name: PKRCNTFE
register.description: Statistical Check Poker Count F and E Register

field.name: SH0
field.description: Reserved. DRNG specific, not applicable to this version

field.name: NO_PRGM
field.description: If set, the TRNG registers cannot be programmed

enumeratedValue.description: Programability of registers controlled only by the Miscellaneous Control Register's access mode bit
Overides Miscellaneous Control Register access mode and prevents TRNG register programming

field.name: SK_VAL
field.description: Reserved. DRNG-specific, not applicable to this version

field.name: HW_ERR
field.description: Bit position that can be cleared if corresponding bit of INT_STATUS has been asserted

field.name: HW_ERR
field.description: Bit position that can be cleared if corresponding bit of INT_STATUS has been asserted

enumeratedValue.description: Corresponding interrupt of INT_STATUS is masked
Corresponding bit of INT_STATUS is active
Busy generation entropy. Any value read is invalid
TRNG can be stopped and entropy is valid if read
No hardware nor self test frequency errors
The frequency counter has detected a failure

field.name: MIN_REV
field.description: Shows the Freescale IP's Minor revision of the TRNG

field.name: MAJ_REV
field.description: Shows the Freescale IP's Major revision of the TRNG

field.name: CONFIG_OPT
field.description: Shows the Freescale IP's Configuaration options for the TRNG

field.name: ECO_REV
field.description: Shows the Freescale IP's ECO revision of the TRNG

field.name: INTG_OPT
field.description: Shows the Freescale integration options for the TRNG

field.name: ERA
field.description: Shows the Freescale compile options for the TRNG
